name: Lucid's Letters
description:
-= Description =-

After a gust of wind blows open Lucinda's bag, her letters are scattered across some old ruins. Determined to get them all back, she sets off to explore and find them all before the sun sets...

Lucid's Letters is a short and relaxing platformer game that follows the messenger, Lucinda, as she tries to find all of her letters. Enjoy an easygoing, simple adventure with an adorable pixel artstyle and charming music.

-= Features =-

♦ Easy controls and gameplay

♦ Simple, relaxing puzzles

♦ 8 unique levels to explore

♦ Collectable plants

-= Controls =-

♦ Arrow keys to move

♦ Spacebar to jump   

♦ E to interact
